title: "AI Startup Combines Mouse Neurons With Silicon Chips To Make Computers Smarter, Faster"
excerpt: "There aren’t many computer chips that you have to build a life support system for. But when you’re combining actual living brain cells with inorganic silicon chips, you can’t feed them just electricity."
